price: Na alipo fikilia utu uzima tulimpa hukumu na ilimu. Na kama hivi tunawalipa wanao tenda mema.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
footnotes: Na Yusuf alipo timia ukomo wa nguvu zake tukampa hukumu yenye kusibu, na ilimu yenye kufaa. Na kama malipo haya tuliyo mpa yeye kwa wema wake, ndio tunavyo wapa wote walio wema kwa vitendo vyao vyema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walammā balagha ashuddahu ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
